004
005package edu.wpi.first.cscore;
006
007/** Video mode. */
008@SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
009public class VideoMode {
010  public enum PixelFormat {
011    kUnknown(0),
012    kMJPEG(1),
013    kYUYV(2),
014    kRGB565(3),
015    kBGR(4),
016    kGray(5),
017    kUYVY(6);
018
019    private final int value;
020
021    PixelFormat(int value) {
022      this.value = value;
023    }
024
025    public int getValue() {
026      return value;
027    }
028  }
029
030  private static final PixelFormat[] m_pixelFormatValues = PixelFormat.values();
031
032  public static PixelFormat getPixelFormatFromInt(int pixelFormat) {
033    return m_pixelFormatValues[pixelFormat];
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Create a new video mode.
038   *
039   * @param pixelFormat The pixel format enum as an integer.
040   * @param width The image width in pixels.
041   * @param height The image height in pixels.
042   * @param fps The camera's frames per second.
043   */
044  public VideoMode(int pixelFormat, int width, int height, int fps) {
045    this.pixelFormat = getPixelFormatFromInt(pixelFormat);
046    this.width = width;
047    this.height = height;
048    this.fps = fps;
049  }
050
051  /**
052   * Create a new video mode.
053   *
054   * @param pixelFormat The pixel format.
055   * @param width The image width in pixels.
056   * @param height The image height in pixels.
057   * @param fps The camera's frames per second.
058   */
059  public VideoMode(PixelFormat pixelFormat, int width, int height, int fps) {
060    this.pixelFormat = pixelFormat;
061    this.width = width;
062    this.height = height;
063    this.fps = fps;
064  }
065
066  /** Pixel format. */
067  public PixelFormat pixelFormat;
068
069  /** Width in pixels. */
070  public int width;
071
072  /** Height in pixels. */
073  public int height;
074
075  /** Frames per second. */
076  public int fps;
077}
